>
[Unending Youth](/Equipment.aspx?ID=762)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Contract" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=329" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 10

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

You cease aging, and if you were older than young adult in age, you become a young adult again. You gain a +4 status bonus to saves against [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects and resistance to negative damage equal to half your level. Once per day, from any distance, Abrogail Thrune II can recite a mandatory appearance clause in your Thrune contract as a 3-action activity to summon you to her side, where you are [controlled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=6) by Abrogail for 1 minute before you return.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> command;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You recite a hold harmless provision from your Thrune contract. Reduce your [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9) value to 0. Abrogail Thrune II is immediately made aware that you have used this ability.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
